[+1542] World's Worst Person Tries to Extort a 19-Year-Old Girl
item.description: Remember John Fitzgerald Page? He's the "actor/model" who is the undisputed Worst Person in the World thanks to his dickish online dating habits and terrible website. Now he's attempting to extort a 19 year-old girl.

item.title: [+1378] Apple's Apology Misses The Mark
item.description: After bullheadedly ignoring the problems with their new iPhone, Apple has finally come forward and offered an explanation for their device's issues.

item.title: [+1278] WoW Gangsta-Wannabe Threatens Ex-Guildies [vid]
item.description: This has got to be the first time this person has seen the light of day. When you get out of breath from talking then it's time to reevaluate your life. ***Spoiler alert: This is not a guy.

item.title: [+989] Coma: One Of The Most Beautiful Flash Games I've Ever Played
item.description: Pete is traveling within his colorful subconsciousness. The art, music and story here are simply amazing.

item.title: [+945] Incredible Images Formed by Thousands of US Soldiers
item.description: Tens of thousands of American soldiers posing as symbols of American history.

[+553] The 1980s: The Decade That Won't Stop Screwing Us [CHART]
item.description: The 1980s were a horrifying decade when snorting cocaine was an Olympic sport and wearing skinny ties and pastel jackets was a requirement at most dining establishments. Also Duran Duran was huge. HUGE! And the horrible decisions didn't end there.

item.title: [+455] We All Had To Update Firefox Because Of Farmville Users
item.description: Firefox users may have noticed they had to upgrade their browser over the weekend. Why did every Firefox user on the planet need this essential upgrade? Because Farmville was broken.

item.title: [+449] Restoration Of Star Spangled Banner Uncovers Horrific Verses
item.description: Susan Eckman from The National Archives comes on Today Now! to share newly discovered National Anthem verses about brutally decapitating enemies during the War of 1812.

item.title: [+431] Zelda Dungeon Live Stream, Marathon, Trivia, Prizes
item.description: Zelda Dungeon Video Stream. Speed run play throughs of Legend of Zelda, Adventure of Link, A Link to the Past, and Link's Awakening. Zelda Trivia, Zelda Prizes, Zelda Discussion and a whole lot more! @ USTREAM: Zelda Dungeon, Legend of Zelda, Zelda Marathon. Video Game Marathon

item.title: [+409] No Vader, you can't have that one [PIC]
item.description: Too bad The Emperor was such a stickler when it came to appearance.

item.title: [+395] Shocking extent of mans impact on worlds water
item.description: These dramatic before-and-after satellite photos show the terrifying effect man is having on the world's resources. Taken over nearly 40 years, photographs show the drying up of several bodies of water around the world - receding as mankind's demand for water grows. Included in the shocking collection is the once mighty Aral Sea in Central Asia.

item.title: [+384] This Dude Gets PWND During A Backflip Attempt (Video)
[+383] Japanese Shrug off 3D TV Hype
item.description: Despite the push by manufacturers, a new survey shows that the 70 percent of Japanese are not planning to purchase a 3D TV for their homes.
